channel.title: Database of filament spools info
channel.description: Recent content on Database of filament spools info

item.title: Fusion Filaments Plutonic Purple ABS 2.0
item.description:
• Printing temp: 245C
  • Bed temp: 90-100 C

  • Height: 73/56 mm (inner hole has reduced height)
  • Hole Diameter: 53 mm
